title: PostgreSQL
description: Collect metadata from a PostgreSQL cluster via read-only credentials.
agentPrompt: Guide the user through connecting to PostgreSQL. Required fields: host, port, database, username, password. Offer help generating read-only roles.

fields.label: Schemas
fields.description: Comma-separated list of schemas to crawl. Leave blank to include all.

fields.label: Version hint
fields.description: Provide the known server version (e.g., 15.3, 19c) if automatic detection is unavailable.

fields.label: Role
fields.description: Optional role to SET ROLE after connecting.

fields.label: SSL mode
fields.description: Matches libpq sslmode. Use verify-full for strict hostname validation.

fields.label: SSL root certificate
fields.description: Absolute path to the CA certificate when using verify-ca or verify-full.

fields.label: Client certificate
fields.description: Path to client certificate when mutual TLS is required.

fields.label: Client private key
fields.description: Path to the private key that pairs with the client certificate.

fields.label: Application name
fields.description: Sets application_name for audit visibility.

fields.label: Connect timeout (ms)
fields.description: Overrides the default JDBC connectTimeout in milliseconds.

fields.label: Statement timeout (ms)
fields.description: Optional timeout enforced via SET statement_timeout after connect.

fields.label: Additional JDBC parameters
fields.description: JSON map of extra driver parameters (e.g., "targetServerType":"primary").

capabilities.label: Tables & views
capabilities.description: Discovers table/view names, owners, storage stats.

capabilities.label: Column metadata
capabilities.description: Data types, nullability, default expressions.

capabilities.label: Foreign keys
capabilities.description: Extracts FK relationships for lineage overlays.

capabilities.label: Catalog metadata
capabilities.description: Supports metadata harvesting via Postgres adapters.

capabilities.label: Live preview
capabilities.description: Supports limited SELECT ... LIMIT queries for previewing datasets.

capabilities.label: Column profiles
capabilities.description: Computes column statistics via Postgres aggregate queries.

methods.label: current_setting('server_version')
methods.description: Queries server_version GUC via read-only SHOW privileges.

methods.label: SELECT version()
methods.description: Fallback probe that parses the PostgreSQL banner.

probing.fallbackMessage: If both probes fail, capture SELECT version() output manually or provide the server_version parameter.

title: Oracle
description: Connect to Oracle databases via JDBC.
agentPrompt: Collect host, port, service name (database), username, and password for the Oracle instance. Ensure the account has read-only access.

fields.label: Connection mode
fields.description: Oracle supports service names (recommended), SID, or Oracle Net descriptors.

fields.label: Service name
fields.description: PDB or service (e.g., orclpdb1.mycorp.net).

fields.label: SID
fields.description: Legacy SID (e.g., ORCL).

fields.label: TNS alias
fields.description: Alias defined inside tnsnames.ora.

fields.label: TNS descriptor
fields.description: Inline descriptor when aliases are not available.

fields.label: Wallet directory
fields.description: Absolute path to the wallet (zip or extracted directory) for TCPS/Autonomous DB.

fields.label: Wallet password
fields.description: Password for the wallet if encryption is enabled.

fields.label: Server DN match
fields.description: Set to true to enforce server DN matching (recommended for TCPS).

fields.label: Schemas
fields.description: Comma-separated schema whitelist (e.g., HR, FINANCE).

fields.label: Version hint
fields.description: Provide the Oracle version (e.g., 19c) if probes cannot run.

capabilities.label: Tables & views
capabilities.description: Discovers table/view names, owners, storage stats.

capabilities.label: Column metadata
capabilities.description: Data types, nullability, default expressions.

capabilities.label: Foreign keys
capabilities.description: Extracts FK relationships for lineage overlays.

capabilities.label: Catalog metadata
capabilities.description: Supports Oracle-specific metadata harvesting.

capabilities.label: Live preview
capabilities.description: Supports sampling queries via read-only sessions.

methods.label: SELECT version FROM v$instance
methods.description: Requires SELECT on v$instance; returns precise Oracle version.

methods.label: SELECT banner FROM v$version
methods.statement: SELECT banner FROM v$version WHERE ROWNUM = 1
methods.description: Fallback banner probe when v$instance access is restricted.

probing.fallbackMessage: If v$ views are unavailable, request the exact Oracle version from the DBA.

title: SQL Server
description: Ingest data from Microsoft SQL Server via JDBC.
agentPrompt: Collect host, port, database, username, and password for the SQL Server instance. Ensure the login has read permissions.

fields.label: Instance name
fields.description: If connecting to a named instance, provide it here (e.g., MSSQLSERVER, ANALYTICS).

fields.label: Schemas
fields.description: Comma-separated list of schemas to crawl. Leave blank to include all.

fields.label: Version hint
fields.description: Provide the known server version (e.g., 15.3, 19c) if automatic detection is unavailable.

fields.label: Authentication mode
fields.description: Choose Active Directory auth when using AAD credentials.

fields.label: Domain
fields.description: NetBIOS or FQDN domain for Active Directory authentication.

fields.label: Encrypt
fields.description: Controls the Encrypt driver parameter.

fields.label: Trust server certificate
fields.description: Set true to bypass certificate validation (testing only).

fields.label: Application intent
fields.description: Set ReadOnly when targeting secondary replicas.

fields.label: Multi subnet failover
fields.description: Enable when using Always On availability groups.

fields.label: Transparent network IP resolution
fields.description: Disable when using legacy DNS behavior by setting false.

capabilities.label: Tables & views
capabilities.description: Discovers table/view names, owners, storage stats.

capabilities.label: Column metadata
capabilities.description: Data types, nullability, default expressions.

capabilities.label: Foreign keys
capabilities.description: Extracts FK relationships for lineage overlays.

capabilities.label: Stored procedure support
capabilities.description: Supports execution of stored procedures for metadata probes.

capabilities.label: Live preview
capabilities.description: Supports TOP clauses for sampling datasets.

methods.label: SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion')
methods.description: Retrieves the semantic version for SQL Server.

probing.fallbackMessage: If SERVERPROPERTY access is denied, request SELECT @@VERSION output from the DBA.

fields.label: Schemas
fields.description: Comma-separated list of schemas to crawl. Leave blank to include all.

fields.label: Version hint
fields.description: Provide the known server version (e.g., 15.3, 19c) if automatic detection is unavailable.

capabilities.label: Tables & views
capabilities.description: Discovers table/view names, owners, storage stats.

capabilities.label: Column metadata
capabilities.description: Data types, nullability, default expressions.

capabilities.label: Foreign keys
capabilities.description: Extracts FK relationships for lineage overlays.

title: HTTP API
description: Connect to REST/GraphQL APIs over HTTP(S).
agentPrompt: Collect the base URL, authentication method (API key or token), and any custom headers required to reach the API.

fields.label: Base URL
fields.description: Root URL for the API, without a trailing slash.

fields.label: API key
fields.description: Static API key issued by the provider.

fields.label: API key header
fields.description: Header name used to send the API key.

fields.label: Bearer token
fields.description: Bearer token supplied via Authorization header.

fields.label: Custom headers
fields.description: JSON map of additional headers to include with every request.

fields.label: Page parameter
fields.description: Query parameter name for the page number (e.g., page).

fields.label: Page size parameter
fields.description: Query parameter for page size/limit.

fields.label: Cursor parameter
fields.description: Parameter carrying the cursor token.

fields.label: Version hint
fields.description: API version identifier if not detectable automatically (e.g., v2).

capabilities.label: Schema introspection
capabilities.description: Supports fetching schema or collection metadata from the API.

capabilities.label: Sample data
capabilities.description: Supports paginated preview requests for quick inspection.

capabilities.label: Webhook sourcing
capabilities.description: Can register webhooks for incremental updates if provided by the API.

methods.label: HTTP OPTIONS
methods.description: Invoke the base URL with an OPTIONS request to inspect allowed methods and CORS headers.

methods.label: GET /health
methods.description: Optional health probe if the API exposes a health endpoint.

probing.fallbackMessage: Provide the API version manually if automated probes are unavailable.

title: Kafka / Confluent
description: Subscribe to Kafka topics via consumer groups for metadata collection or CDC.
agentPrompt: Collect bootstrap servers, security protocol (PLAINTEXT/SSL/SASL), authentication material, and target topics.

fields.label: Bootstrap servers
fields.description: Comma-separated host:port pairs for the Kafka cluster.

fields.label: CA certificate path
fields.description: Filesystem path to the trusted CA certificate.

fields.label: Topics
fields.description: Comma-separated list of topics to scan for metadata.

fields.label: Consumer group
fields.description: Consumer group ID used for offsets when streaming records.

capabilities.label: Topic metadata
capabilities.description: Fetches topic configurations, partitions, and replication metadata.

capabilities.label: Change streams
capabilities.description: Supports subscribing to topics that deliver CDC events.

capabilities.label: Sample records
capabilities.description: Allows sampling a limited number of records for inspection.

methods.label: Broker metadata
methods.description: Uses the Kafka Admin client to fetch broker metadata and supported features.

probing.fallbackMessage: Provide the Kafka cluster version manually if admin APIs are unavailable.
